thread.title: China Tells Bitcoin Exchanges to Follow Forex Rules - WSJ
thread.title_full: China Tells Bitcoin Exchanges to Follow Forex Rules - WSJ

author: Chao Deng
title: China Tells Bitcoin Exchanges to Follow Forex Rules - WSJ
text:
China Tells Bitcoin Exchanges to Follow Forex Rules Central bank threatens shutdowns if regulations aren’t adhered to By Google+ Updated Feb. 8, 2017 10:06 p.m. ET 
SHANGHAI—China’s central bank warned domestic bitcoin exchanges that they risk being shut down in the virtual currency’s largest market if found to be skirting rules on foreign exchange and money laundering. 
The People’s Bank of China said in a statement Thursday that it held a meeting with nine bitcoin trading platforms Wednesday to remind them about potential legal, policy and other risks.
